law.text: Each application for registration, change of affiliation, transfer of registration or absentee ballot, as absentee ballots are provided for by KRS 117.075, shall be verified by a written declaration by the applicant that it is made under the penalties of perjury.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 296, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 37, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 6, effective June 21, 1974.
